tokensReceived(address,address,address,u.details: Called by the ERC777 token contract after a successful transfer or a minting operation.

params.amount: The amount of tokens that were transferred or minted.
params.data: Additional data that was passed during the transfer or minting operation.
params.operator: The address of the operator performing the transfer or minting operation.
params.operatorData: Additional data that was passed by the operator during the transfer or minting operation.
